0101111000011001 1111001001101010 1 -> sum: 0101000010000100, cout: 1

0100100111001100 1011100000100101 0 -> sum: 0000000111110001, cout: 1
0100101110010100 0110101000000010 1 -> sum: 1011010110010111, cout: 0
0111111100010001 0010100000000100 0 -> sum: 1010011100010101, cout: 0
0010001100110011 1000010111101011 1 -> sum: 1010100100011111, cout: 0
